content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Iron plate production at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-83.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0) 
-  Chests at positions (x=40.5, y=-80.5), (x=43.5, y=-81.5)

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of lab with no input or research in progress

### Inserter system at position(x=3.5, y=0.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner inserter (position x=3.5, y=0.5) 
-  Chest at position (x=2.5, y=0.5) 
-  Small electric pole at position (x=2.5, y=1.5)

### Inserter system at position(x=0.5, y=3.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner inserter (position x=0.5, y=3.5) 
-  Chest at position (x=0.5, y=2.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities but being out of fuel
 -  Ensure burner entities have sufficient fuel to operate
### Errors when using furnaces but having no ingredients to smelt
 -  Ensure furnaces have the necessary ingredients to smelt
### Errors when using steam engines but having no input liquid
 -  Ensure steam engines have the necessary input liquid to operate
### Errors when using boilers but being out of fuel
 -  Ensure boilers have sufficient fuel to operate
### Errors when using offshore pumps but having no connection to fluid systems
 -  Ensure offshore pumps are connected to fluid systems to operate
### Errors when using generators but having no connection to fluid systems or electric poles
 -  Ensure generators are connected to fluid systems and electric poles to operate
